items.text: attacks the stumps by slipping this full on middle, turned wide of midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on off, punches to mid-off.
items.postText: Teflon Dee has some advice: "Taylor and Williams looking tidy with the singles so far. They should keep their wickets till 35th over and then unleash."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: drifting away, he drives wide of mid-off for a quick single again.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: lunges forward and eases with the spin to extra cover.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: nearly beaten by a slider, defends to get a thick inside edge to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: gets a long way forward and smothers the spin of this quicker delivery.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: makes a hint of room and punches on the up to sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.text: mistimes a lofted hit off a thick inside edge to long-on.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: gets outside the line of off and defends this length ball.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: mistimes this punch back past the bowler, they chance the run with mid-on swooping in quickly and manage to finish it in time.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: dabs this slower length ball to the man coming in from point.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: slower length ball on middle, looks to drop and run but this is excellent work from Apu at cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: whips this incoming length delivery to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: goes right through him! Superb delivery, hint of late movement back in. Taylor shapes to drive but the ball cuts in to beat the inside edge. Through to Mushfiqur
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: driven with the spin to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: works this with the angle to long-on
items.postText: Simba: "What i like about Taylor is that, unlike other Zim batsmen, when he gets a start he usually makes it count. Very optimistic about today! A bit worried though that when he misfires nobody takes a lead role to make a century for the team."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.text: punches this shortish delivery to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: looks to go over cover but gets a thick edge, fortunately lands short of short third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: fires this short delivery down leg, Taylor misses the paddle. Excellent glove work by Mushfiqur
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 wide

items.preText: Taylor has been given out lbw, and he has reviewed immediately. First thoughts: may have been slipping down leg. Let's see
items.text: ill-advised sweep to a full delivery that was fired in. This pitched on leg and was spinning down. At the point of impact, Mushfiqur was on his way down leg. There is no glove on the ball even though it is very, very close to it as he plays the stroke. Impact the question really. Hawkeye shows this was slipping down leg. Decision overturned.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: punches this down to long-on for an easy single
items.postText: Saurabh is ready to slip back into the hot seat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, patted back to the bowler's right
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, coming in a touch, he plays with the angle to tap it to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball, angling in to the stumps, defended with a straight bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, driven off his toes. Short midwicket dives and fields, but then a wayward throw allows a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run
